title: 154. What to Know About the Second-Round of PPP
description: Stephanie O’Rourk, CPA, is a partner at CohnReznick who leads the Firm’s National Hospitality Emerging Concepts and  Operational and Financial Consulting Divisions. With more than 25 years of public accounting experience in both audit,  advisory and tax, Stephanie has worked closely with entrepreneurs, advising clients on best practices and tax efficient  strategies. Her clients consider her a trusted business advisor and value her experienced insights and business acumen.
